casebody.data:
Western New York and Pennsylvania Railway Company, Appellant, v. City of Buffalo et al., Respondents.

Reported below, 264 App. Div. 832.

Submitted October 5, 1942; decided October 15, 1942. Percy R. Smith and Harold J. Adams for motion. Andrew P. Ronan, Corporation Counsel (Herbert A. Hickman of counsel), opposed.

Motion denied, with ten dollars costs and necessary printing disbursements on the ground the appeal lies as of right.
